text: Floored by Four was an American rock band from New York City. The group consisted of bassist and singer Mike Watt, guitarist Nels Cline, keyboardist Yuka Honda and drummer Dougie Bowne. They were inspired by Sun Ra, Miles Davis, Captain Beefheart and Sonic Youth among others. Their eponymous debut album was released in September 2010 on Chimera Records. ==Discography== * Floored by Four (2010) ==References== Category:Rock music groups from New York (state) Category:Musical groups established in 2010 Category:Musical groups from New York City
title: Floored by Four
